VERIFICATION.Title: Charakterverifizierung
VERIFICATION.Guide: Um dein Konto zu verifizieren füge diesen Code in deine Lodestone Biografie ein: "{{userId}}". Klicke danach den Button unten.

VERIFICATION.Error: Der Code konnte nicht in deiner Biografie gefunden werden. Stelle sicher dass er eingefügt und gespeichert wurde, und versuche es in ~30 Sekunden erneut.

FAIL_CAUSE.UNSAFE_ACTION: Unsafe action with safe mode enabled
FAIL_CAUSE.DURABILITY_REACHED_ZERO: Durability reached 0 before progression reached max
FAIL_CAUSE.NOT_SPECIALIST: Specialist rotation but you're not specialist
FAIL_CAUSE.NO_INNER_QUIET: Tried to use Inner Quiet action without Inner Quiet buff enabled

ROTATION_TIPS.Use_inner_quiet: Almost all the rotations should include Inner Quiet if your goal is to HQ the item. It provides a really good quality boost and enables actions like Byregot's Blessing.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_inner_quiet_before_quality_increase: You should apply Inner Quiet before any quality increase, not doing that means that you're wasting Inner Quiet stacks.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_ingenuity_I_instead: You should use Ingenuity I instead of II to lower cost by 8CP, as it will be enough to finish the craft.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_cz_earlier: You should use Comfort Zone earlier to get the restoration effect sooner
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_reclaim: You have enough remaining CP to use Reclaim, you should add it to the rotation to make sure you get materials back if you fail the craft
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_byregot_brow_low_iq_stacks: You used Byregot's Blessing with less than 6 stacks. Using Byregot's Brow is better in this case as it will produce more quality.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_byregot_blessing_high_iq_stacks: You used Byregot's Brow with more than 6 stacks. Using Byregot's Blessing is better in this case as it will produce more quality.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_sh1_instead: You used Steady Hand II at step {{index}} while using Steady Hand I would be enough and would cost 3 less CP.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_sh2_instead: You used Steady Hand I at step {{index}} while using Steady Hand II give you more reliability at the cost of 3 CP.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_pbp_first: You should use Piece by Piece before any other synthesis action, as it scales on the remaining progress to do
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_mume_if_pbp: You should use Muscle Memory at step 1 in order to replace one Piece by Piece and gain 9 extra CP
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_observe_before_focused: You should use Observe before the Focused action at step {{index}} in order to get a free 100% success rate.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_durability_restoration_later: You should use the durability restoration action at step {{index}} later in order to avoid wasting durability restoration.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_patient_touch_faster: You should use Patient Touch before adding Inner Quiet stacks, in order to minimize wasted stacks if the action fails.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_advanced_touch_instead: You used Basic Touch then Advanced Touch one after another at step {{index}}, you should use two Standard Touches instead to get same potency for 2 less CP.
ROTATION_TIPS.Do_not_overlap_buffs: You overlapped the buff applied at step {{overlappedIndex}} with the buff applied at step {{overlappingIndex}}, you should delay the second one in order to get maximum benefits from your buffs.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_byregot_brow_5_stacks: You should use Byregot's Brow instead of Byregot's blessing for the same quality added but 6 less CP used.

INTRO.Title: Freibriefe
INTRO.First_line: Diese Seite stellt eine Suche nach einem oder mehreren Freibriefen zur Verfügung um von den Ergebnissen eine Liste zu erstellen
INTRO.Second_line: Wähle einen Job, stelle den Stufenbereich ein und du erhälst eine Liste der betreffenden Freibriefe. Markiere die Freibriefe um die Rezepte einer Liste hinzuzufügen.
INTRO.Third_line: Du kannst ebenfalls nach Name suchen, wenn du schon weißt wonach du suchst.

MARKETBOARD.Title: Marktbrett-Information
MARKETBOARD.Error: XIVAPI oder Companion API nicht erreichbar, bitte warte einen Moment und versuche es erneut.

SEARCH_INTRO.Lists_created_counter: {{amount}} Listen wurden mit FFXIV Teamcraft erstellt

DESCRIPTION.Lists: Erstelle Listen um Informationen über alle Materialien zu erhalten, Teile sie mit deinen Freunden, alles startet hier! Suche einfach nach einem Gegenstand, filtere nach spezifischen Gegenstände, und fang an Dinge herzustellen.
DESCRIPTION.Public_lists: Kopiere von der Community erstellte Listen, die dir helfen Dinge herzustellen. Ausrüstung, Freibriefe, Notizbücher, Luftschiffe, alles kann hier gefunden werden.
DESCRIPTION.Alarms: Erstelle Alarme um kein Erscheinen eines Vorkommens zu verpassen, organisiere sie in Gruppen, importiere sie im Spiel, alles ist möglich.
DESCRIPTION.Gathering_location: Finde Informationen über alle Sammlergegenstände, erstelle Alarme, erhalte sofort Koordinaten, den nächsten Ätheryten, erforderliche Bücher, und mehr!
DESCRIPTION.Rotations: Erstelle Rotationen zum Herstellen, teste sie im Simulator, oder teste theoretische Rotationen mit dem benutzerdefinierten Simulator!
DESCRIPTION.Levequests: Fine Freibriefe für einen bestimmten Job und/oder Stufenbereich, schau dir den Fortschritt an und erstelle daraus Listen.
DESCRIPTION.Macro_translation: Du hast Macros, die nicht in deiner Sprache sind? Nutze die Makro-Übersetzung und übersetze es in deine Sprache damit es auch in deinem FFXIV funktioniert!

UPDATE.Desktop_instructions: Klicke hier, um die neueste Version herunterzuladen:

DESYNTH.Title: Desynth guide
DESYNTH.Intro: Select a job and input a level to find best items to level up your desynth

SUPPORT_US.Title: Help us grow !
SUPPORT_US.Communication_description:
Let people know about the tool, share rotations, lists. Create videos, blog posts, tweets, everything that lets more people know about Teamcraft really helps the project more than you would think.

We even prepared a macro for you so you can shout your love everywhere !
SUPPORT_US.Contribute_description:
You can find us on github to contribute to the project, even if you're a beginner, everybody is welcome !

But contributing isn't only about the code, feature requests and bug reports help the tool a lot by providing best quality content possible for everyone, thank to the people who take some time to stress test it and find bugs.
SUPPORT_US.Patreon_description:
Patreon is a platform where you can give a money to support a project every month. This money is used to pay for servers, certificates, giveaways and to free more and more time for the developer to work on the project.

Depending on the amount you pledge, you can get some nice benefits in order to thank your contribution:

PATREON_BENEFITS.Discord_rank: Special rank on the discord server, giving you access to supporters channel to see what's we're working on (${{price}})
PATREON_BENEFITS.Profile_badge: Special badge on your Teamcraft profile (${{price}})
PATREON_BENEFITS.Custom_theme: Better theme customization, with custom color input (${{price}})
PATREON_BENEFITS.Pins_badge: Exclusive Teamcraft pins badge sent to you (${{price}}) (needs you to fill out shipment details on Patreon)
PATREON_BENEFITS.Loading_screen_message: Add a new entry inside the "Brought to you by ..." loading message, with your name, your FC name, LS name, whatever you want to add ! (${{price}})

TIPS.Title: Tip
TIPS.Community_rotations: You can find rotations for a given recipe inside the community rotations page.
TIPS.GC_Deliveries: You can prepare lists for GC deliveries inside the GC deliveries page.
TIPS.Desynth: You can find ideal items to level up desynth in desynth page.
TIPS.DB: Teamcraft includes a database, you can click on the "i" icon anywhere to open database page for the item it is next to.
TIPS.3D_model: You can preview 3D model of items inside the database.
TIPS.Levequests: You can prepare leve lists and preview exp gains inside the levequests page.
TIPS.Log_tracker: You can track your log progression (gathering, crafting, fishing) inside the log tracker page.
TIPS.Desktop_app_overlay: You can have an overlay for alarms when using the desktop app (download link inside the sidebar).
